Event Properties Dialog Box

Requires: NI Distributed System Manager

In the Alarms and Events view, double-click an event to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to view the properties of an event.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Object Name—Displays the name of the event.
  • Set Time—Displays the time that the event occurred.
  • Description—Displays the description of the event.
